talk.author: did:plc:puqzulsunae2g3f44thfoq3y
talk.utter: That's not what I asked. I enquired why you think student loan forgiveness is a problem. Let's go one at a time.

talk.author: did:plc:a6gdtkuncuru3ffs34sjcc4w
talk.utter: Why give loan forgiveness to a particular group.  17.4% of those with loan forgiveness had an annual income from $152,000- $240,000.  23.9% were between $92,000-$151,000.  Over 40% of those that received forgiveness have incomes more than double the average income of all Americans.
